purpose: AG2 aims to provide a flexible and extensible framework for building and deploying AI agents that can perform a variety of tasks autonomously.
principle: The core principle of AG2 is to enable users to create agents that can learn from their environment and improve their performance over time through interaction and feedback.
reusability: AG2 is designed with modular components that allow developers to reuse existing agents and functionalities, facilitating quicker development cycles and easier integration.
limitations: As an alpha project, AG2 may have stability issues, limited documentation, and incomplete features that are still under development.
